title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer navigates the dangers of the drug trade.

title: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids uncover supernatural forces and secret experiments in their small town.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne in a land full of betrayal and magic.

title: The Mandalorian
description: A lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy protects a mysterious child.

title: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove worse than beasts.

title: Friends
description: Follows the lives of six friends living in New York City as they navigate love and careers.

title: The Office
description: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

title: Narcos
description: The true story of Colombia's infamously violent and powerful drug cartels.

title: Black Mirror
description: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

title: Westworld
description: Set in a futuristic amusement park staffed by android hosts, where guests can live out their fantasies.

title: Parks and Recreation
description: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Money Heist
description: A group of robbers assault the Royal Mint of Spain to print billions of euros.

title: The Crown
description: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign.

title: The Boys
description: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes.

title: Better Call Saul
description: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill before his transformation into Saul Goodman.

title: Dexter
description: A blood spatter analyst for the Miami Metro Police who moonlights as a serial killer targeting criminals.

title: House of Cards
description: A ruthless politician manipulates his way to the presidency of the United States.

title: Sherlock
description: Modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: Vikings
description: The adventures of Ragnar Lothbrok, a legendary Norse hero.

title: The Flash
description: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen becomes the fastest man alive.

title: Power
description: A drug dealer doubles as a nightclub owner trying to leave his criminal past behind.

title: Power Book II: Ghost
description: Following the events of Power, Tariq St. Patrick must juggle his new life as a college student and the family legacy.

title: Power Book III: Raising Kanan
description: The story of Kanan Stark's teenage years and the origins of the Power universe.
